item.text: This is a quick thought. The thought is that it would be useful to build in a physical sensor" into the [[Building Utopia]] project. Something that we can easily measure in terms of real world effect of the methodology.

A suggestion is that we create a poetic simulation of [[Daisy World]] - something like a [[Canary in a Mine]] in which communites have to tend a garden, and the garden has sensors. How well are the plants watered? How well do they thrive?
